title: LOAD BREAK DISCONNECTION DEVICES INTEGRATED INTO THE PCE
fullText:
For load break disconnection devices integrated into the PCE, the suitability of the switch is dependent on the installation conditions. Where the PCE is installed—
(a) in either indoor installations or in outdoors installations without exposure to solar effects, the load break disconnection device shall be rated to a minimum temperature rating of 40°C.
(b) outdoors and exposed to solar effects, the load break disconnection device shall be rated to a minimum temperature rating of 60°C.
